Class GameOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameOutput
  • public class GameOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the console outputs for a game of TicTacToe in english and german. The class has the following functionalities: Print a welcome message. Print the board. Print a request for a language change. Print a messsage if a language change has been made. Print a request for a player to make a move. Print a message for the winning or draw conditions. Print a message in case of a wrong move.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yves Br√§ndli, Nadine Moser, Robin Meier
